snippet.title: LinkIt! Mini Gameplay (New Addictive Reflex Game)
snippet.description:
☆☆☆ New fast-paced minimalistic reflex game ☆☆☆

★Try to link every blue dot with a line while not touching the red ones!
★Collect the bonus dots and buy new themes from shop!

It seems easy, huh? This game is going to drive you crazy!

Coming soon to Google Play

Follow us on Twitter to keep updated!
https://twitter.com/linkitgame
